group_1.textLeft: I'm back!

group_1.textRight: W-welcome back, Lady Lapin...
I take it your mission...@went successfully?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! It was a piece of cake!

group_1.textRight: Oh... There's blood on your clothes...!
I apologize for not noticing it sooner,@let me tend to it...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, this?@It's just splattered blood, I'm fine!

group_1.textRight: R-really?
W-well... Let me bring you a change of clothes...

group_1.textLeft: Thanks!

group_1.textCenter: (It was just like Perenelle said.@Lady Lapin and the others...)
He should have been killed by those guys@with Witch Kisses...

group_1.textLeft: A girl with potential is precious, but...
There's no choice but to kill her, right?

group_1.textRight: Quiet! Don't make a sound.
Lapin will find us if you do.

group_1.textLeft: This voice... is in my head...?

group_1.textRight: It's because you have magical potential.

group_1.textLeft: Magic... Is it really true...?

group_1.textRight: I wanted to stop Lapin, but it seems we were too@late.
Neither the lord nor his daughter could be saved...
...Indeed, it seems Lapin's target was the lord's@family.
She orchestrates attacks on the families of targeted children, ensuring one survives.
Then, she protects girls with magical potential, gathering them into the court as maids of honor...

group_1.textLeft: (And I...am one of them?)
(The ones who took my father and mother's lives...)
(...were Lady Lapin and the others...?)

group_1.textRight: The assembled maidens are eventually forced to@sign contracts.
They become soulless Magical Girls who have lost@their will.

group_1.textLeft: Those silent girls who stand by Lady Minou...
Are they... Magical Girls?

group_1.textRight: Becoming a Magical Girl doesn't normally mean@losing your will.
However, in the case of those girls, they were forced@to sign a contract.
So they all lost their willpower.
Minou, Lapin, Corbeau, and I are Magical Girls.
We each have different abilities, but we all use@magic and hunt Witches.
La Pucelle, who liberated Orleans, is also a@Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: Liberated...?
Fort Tourelles, the last major stronghold,@should still be standing.
Lady Corbeau is likely confronting La Pucelle@right now.

group_1.textRight: Corbeau was defeated by La Pucelle and her fellow@Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:831300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
L-lady Corbeau...?!

group_1.textRight: The English camp has conceded defeat and is likely@to request a truce tomorrow.
"France will be destroyed by a woman."
"But shall be saved by a girl."
The prophecy circulating amongst the people is@about to come true.

group_1.textLeft: La Pucelle, Jeanne, whom Dauphin Charles calls@a saint...
...is the girl who will save France...?

group_1.textRight: The only way to stop England's invasion and save France...
...is with her.
If you are willing to cooperate with La Pucelle,
I can make you a Magical Girl...
In return, I can grant you one wish of any kind.

group_1.textLeft: Giving me a wish... and magical power?
(The angelic banner that La Pucelle carried...)
(Is this how she became a messenger of God?)
...I cannot.
I can't betray my father by siding with Dauphin@Charles' faction.

group_1.textRight: Well... We can't force you.
However, La Pucelle is undoubtedly at the center@of the fate surrounding this country.
If La Pucelle met a new Magical Girl...
The future would be sure to change.
I have no intention of forcing a contract on you.
I just want to avoid you becoming an enemy of@La Pucelle.
I am just saying that it is an option if you want it.
...Yes.
Now, let's send you back to your camp.
Before your mistress returns...
